p: The set of data used in this study was collected in 2004 from the municipality of Nova Iguaçu, state of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, situated at latitude 22°45’33” South and longitude 43°27’04” West, with a total area of 523,888 m 2. This county had a population of 750,485 inhabitants and a demographic density of 1,413.8 inhabitants/km 2. The temperature and the average annual precipitation of rain are 21.8° C and 2,105 mm, respectively.
